DOC.brief_summary: Stable Asthma patient ( GINA 1-2 ) stay 6 day row 4 hour per day hypoxic chamber simulate 2800m sea level . Study participant blind treatment give divide hypoxic sham group ( 360m sea level ) . Effects intermittent hypoxia asthmatic inflammation patient measure . The primary endpoint change force exhaled nitric oxide ( FeNO ) study . Secondary endpoint include blood parameter , lung function test questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: stable Asthma ( GINA 12 ) autoimmune disease unstable Asthma ( GINA 34 ) history pneumonia/fever within 3 month place residence > 1000m sea level trip/vacation > 2500m within 4 week cystic fibrosis diabetes mellitus immunodeficiency atopic dermatitis ciliary dyskinesia pregnancy chronic obstructive pulmonary disease history smoking ( > 1py ) immunosuppression / systemic corticosteroid within 3 month cardiovascular disease interstitial lung disease bronchopulmonary dysplasia
